etymology.description: Depicts a kneeling woman resembling 母(母) (mǔ, "mother"), holding and breastfeeding a child -> representation of milk
etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents the act of breastfeeding, which naturally connects to the concept of milk, aligning with the pictorial elements of a mother and child.

examples.chinese: 婴儿喝母乳(嬰兒喝母乳)。
奶牛产乳(奶牛產乳)，农民收集乳汁(農民收集乳汁)。
examples.english: The dairy cows produce milk, and the farmers collect the milk.

examples.chinese: 年轻人喜欢喝豆乳(年輕人喜歡喝豆乳)。
examples.english: Young people like to drink soy milk.
